# Ninja Runner  

As part of the **SayCheese Program**, I’ve created an exciting offline game called **Ninja Runner**. The unique aspect of this project is that the entire source code can fit into a QR code! You can play it entirely offline by simply scanning the QR code.  

## How to Play  
1. Scan the QR code below to access the game.  
2. Use the [SayCheese Tryout](https://saycheese.hackclub.com/tryout.html) to scan the QR code.  
3. Enjoy the game in your browser—no internet connection required!  

### QR Code  
![Scan to Play](https://github.com/aryanmustare/Ninja-Runner/blob/main/qr_code.png)  

## If you cant scan QR code copy & paste this : 
data:text/html;base64,

## Features  
- Minimalist design with smooth gameplay.  
- Fully offline functionality after scanning the QR code.  
- Fun and simple mechanics—press **Space** to jump and avoid obstacles.  

## Technologies Used  
- **HTML**: Structure of the game and its elements.  
- **CSS**: Styling and layout of the game.  
- **JavaScript**: Game logic, animations, and interactivity.
